content: पिटकः --कं {@--1@} A box, basket. {@--2@} A granary. {@--3@} A pimple, pustule, small boil or ulcer; (also पिटका or पिटिका in this sense); ततः गंडस्योपी पिटका संवृत्ता <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--4@} A kind of ornament on the banner of Indra. {@--5@} A collection of writings. as विनयपिटकं. --का A small boil or pimple.
